title: Unpacking EOF: Applications in Developer Infrastructure and Tooling
description:
In this talk, we will delve into the Ethereum Object Format (EOF), a pivotal component of the upcoming Pectra hard-fork, focusing on its profound implications for development infrastructure and tooling. EIP-7692 introduces a new execution environment and a structured format for executable code, bringing extensive changes to the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM).

How will it affect developers? What will make their lives harder and what easier?
